name: jquery-easyscroll
description: A jQuery plugin for scrolling a set of images/elements easily

scripts.build: rollup src/jquery.easyscroll.js --file dist/jquery.easyscroll.esm.js --format esm --external jquery && rollup src/jquery.easyscroll.js --file dist/jquery.easyscroll.cjs --format cjs --exports default --external jquery && rollup src/jquery.easyscroll.js --file dist/jquery.easyscroll.umd.js --format umd --name EasyScroll --external jquery --globals jquery:jQuery

author: Nishadil.Dev <opensource@nishadil.dev>
